notes: Enter the 10-digit NHS Number of the subject you want to search for.
Enter the subject's age in years (e.g., 65).
Enter the subject's age in years and days, separated by a slash (e.g., 65/25 for 65 years and 25 days).
Select the hub or organisation for the subject.
Specify if the subject should have a temporary address.
Select the screening centre code to use.
Specify if the subject has a GP practice.
Enter the screening centre code to check if the subject's GP practice is associated with it.
Select the current screening status for the subject.
Select the previous screening status for the subject.
Select the reason for the current screening status.
allowed_values: Age Extension First Call - May Self-refer
Discharge from Surveillance - Cannot Contact Patient
Eligible to be invited for FS Screening
No longer eligible to be invited for FS Screening
Reinstate Surveillance for Reversal of Death Notification
Reset after being Paused and Ceased
Reset seeking further data to Call
Reset seeking further data to FS Screening
Reset seeking further data to Inactive
Reset seeking further data to Lynch Surveillance
Reset seeking further data to Lynch Self-referral
Reset seeking further data to Opt-In
Reset seeking further data to Recall
Reset seeking further data to Self-referral
Reset seeking further data to Surveillance
Reset seeking further data to bowel scope
Set Seeking Further Data to Call/Recall

notes: Enter the date when the screening status was last changed in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Enter the previous Lynch due date for the subject, or use a special value.
Enter the previous screening due date for the subject in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Enter the previous screening due date that falls on the subject's birthday in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Enter the previous surveillance due date for the subject, or use a special value.
Enter the current screening due date for the subject in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Enter the screening due date that falls on the subject's birthday in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Enter the calculated screening due date for the subject, or use a special value.
Enter the calculated screening due date that falls on the subject's birthday, or use a special value.
Enter the calculated FOBT due date for the subject in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Select the reason for the current screening due date.
allowed_values: Discharge from Surveillance - Cannot Contact Patient
Eligible to be invited for FS Screening
No longer eligible to be invited for FS Screening
Request screening episode outside normal recall
Reset after being Paused and Ceased

notes: Enter the date when the screening due date was last changed in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Enter the current surveillance due date for the subject in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Enter the calculated surveillance due date for the subject in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Select the reason for the current surveillance due date.
allowed_values: Discharge from Surveillance - Cannot Contact Patient
Reinstate Surveillance for Reversal of Death Notification

notes: Enter the date when the surveillance due date was last changed in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Select the reason for the bowel scope due date.
allowed_values: Eligible to be invited for FS Screening
No longer eligible to be invited for FS Screening

notes: Specify if a manual cease has been requested for the subject.
Enter the date when the subject's cease was confirmed in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Enter details or select a reason for the subject's cease confirmation.
Select or enter the user ID that confirmed the cease. Can be an Enum value, 'User's ID', or a numeric value.
Select the clinical reason for ceasing the subject.
allowed_values: Already involved in Surveillance Programme outside BCSP
Clinical Assessment indicates Cease Surveillance and Screening
Under treatment for ulcerative colitis, Crohn's disease, bowel cancer or other, resulting in cease

notes: Select the event status that the subject must have.
Select the event status that the subject must not have.
Specify if the subject has unprocessed SSPI updates.
Specify if the subject has user date of birth updates.
Specify if the subject has any episodes.
Specify if the subject has an open episode.
Specify if the subject has FOBT episodes.
Enter the minimum FOBT age for the subject.
Enter the minimum Lynch age for the subject.
Select the type of the latest episode for the subject.
Select the sub-type of the latest episode for the subject.
Select the status of the latest episode for the subject.
Select the reason for the status of the latest episode.
allowed_values: Currently involved in a surveillance programme outside BCSP
Discharge from Surveillance - Cannot Contact Patient
Discharged from Screening into Symptomatic care
Subject not available for offered appointment

notes: Select the recall calculation method for the latest episode.
allowed_values: Below FOBT age range at recall

notes: Select the recall episode type for the latest episode.
Select the recall surveillance type for the latest episode.
Select the status of the latest event for the subject.
Select the event status before an interruption.
Select the event code that must be included in the latest episode.
Select the event code that must not be included in the latest episode.
Select the event status that must be included in the latest episode.
Select the event status that must not be included in the latest episode.
Enter the start date of the latest episode in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Enter the end date of the latest episode using one of the options.
Specify the kit class for the latest episode (e.g., 'FIT', 'GFOBT').
Specify if the latest episode has a significant kit result. Options: 'yes' or 'no'.
Specify if the latest episode has a referral date.
Specify if the latest episode has a diagnosis date.
Specify if the subject has diagnostic tests.
Specify if the latest episode has a diagnostic test.
Select the reason for the diagnosis date in the latest episode.
allowed_values: System closure after no input of diagnosis date

notes: Specify if the latest episode was completed satisfactorily.
Specify if the subject has a diagnostic test containing a polyp.
Specify if the subject has unlogged kits. Options:
Specify if the subject has logged FIT kits.
Specify if the subject has kit notes.
Specify if the subject has a Lynch diagnosis.
Specify which test kit to use.
Specify if the kit has been read, you must also use 'which test kit'.
Specify the kit result, you must also use 'which test kit'.
Specify if the kit has an analyser result code, you must also use 'which test kit'.
Specify which appointment to use.
Select the type of appointment, you must also use 'which appointment'.
Select the status of the appointment, you must also use 'which appointment'.
Enter the date of the appointment using one of the options, you must also use 'which appointment'.
Select which diagnostic test to use.
allowed_values: latest not-void test in latest episode
earliest not-void test in latest episode
only not-void test in latest episode

notes: Select the confirmed type of diagnostic test, you must also use 'which diagnostic test'.
Select the proposed type of diagnostic test, you must also use 'which diagnostic test'.
Specify if the diagnostic test is void, you must also use 'which diagnostic test'.
Specify if the diagnostic test has a result, you must also use 'which diagnostic test'.
Specify if the diagnostic test has an outcome, you must also use 'which diagnostic test'.
Specify if the diagnostic test failed.
Select the intended extent of the diagnostic test, you must also use 'which diagnostic test'.
Specify if the latest episode has a cancer audit dataset.
Specify if the latest episode has a colonoscopy assessment dataset.
Specify if the latest episode has an MDT dataset.
Specify the latest investigation dataset for the latest episode.
Select the intended extent for the latest episode dataset.
Select the type of surveillance review case.
Select the date of death for the subject.
Specify if the subject has had a date of death removal.
Specify if the subject has been invited since the age extension.
Enter a comparator and integer for the note count (e.g., '>= 2').
Select the status of the surveillance review.
Specify if the subject has an existing surveillance review case.
Enter the date of the subject's 75th birthday, or use a special value.
Select the accumulated result for the latest episode.
Select the result of the symptomatic procedure, you must also use 'which diagnostic test'
allowed_values: Patient is unfit for a symptomatic procedure at this time

notes: Enter the date of the symptomatic procedure, you must also use 'which diagnostic test'.
Enter the confirmed date of the diagnostic test, or use a special value.
Select the type of screening referral.
Enter the calculated Lynch due date for the subject in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Enter the Lynch due date for the subject in DD/MM/YYYY or YYYY-MM-DD format.
allowed_values: 2 years from last Lynch colonoscopy date

notes: Select the reason for the Lynch due date.
Enter the date when the Lynch due date was last changed, or use a special value.
Select the Lynch incident episode type.
Enter the date of the Lynch diagnosis, or use a special value.
Enter the date of the last Lynch colonoscopy, or use a special value.
Select the ASA grade for the CADS dataset.
Specify if staging scans were performed for the CADS dataset.
Select the type of scan for the CADS dataset.
Specify if metastases are present in the CADS dataset.
Select the location of metastases in the CADS dataset.
Enter any other location of metastases not covered by the standard options.
Select the final pre-treatment T category for the CADS dataset.
allowed_values: Tumour invades through muscularis propria into subserosa or into non-peritonealized pericolic or peri-rectal tissues (cT3)
Tumour directly invades other organs or structures and/or perforates visceral peritoneum (cT4)

notes: Select the final pre-treatment N category for the CADS dataset.
allowed_values: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed (cNX)
Metastasis in 1 to 3 regional lymph nodes (cN1)
Metastasis in 4 or more regional lymph nodes (cN2)

notes: Select the final pre-treatment M category for the CADS dataset.
Specify if treatment was received for the CADS dataset.
Select the reason why no treatment was received for the CADS dataset.

Select the tumour location for the CADS dataset.
Enter the height of the tumour above the anal verge (numeric value).
Specify if the tumour was previously excised for the CADS dataset.
Enter the treatment start date for the CADS dataset, or use a special value.
Select the type of treatment for the CADS dataset.
Specify the treatment given for the CADS dataset.
Select the intent of cancer treatment for the CADS dataset.
Specify if the subject has previously had cancer.
Select the prevalent/incident status for FOBT.
Select the status of the queued Notify message.
Select the status of the archived Notify message.
Select the reason for onward referral.
Select the reason for referral from symptomatic, you must also use 'which diagnostic test'.
Select the type for another diagnostic test referral.
Select the type for referral from symptomatic, you must also use 'which diagnostic test'.
Select the reason for symptomatic referral.
Enter the name of the column to add to the select statement, also specify the prefix. E.g. ss.screening_subject_id.
